Reviews.Title: “Good location. Clean. Friendly staff.”

Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights july hotel near main attractions located quiet street near rialto 2 min walk rialto building little cracks ceiling walls painted clean cleaned towels linen changed day views canal breakfast basic nice staff friendly strongly recommended looking quiet dont spend

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Find in Venice!!!”
Reviews.Author: ScottinLA50
Reviews.Content: stayed cousin 4 nights october 2010 cute little hotel canals location cant beat 5 minutes san marco square 2 minutes rialto bridge time finding little tricky quiet canals hotel 2 3 star stayed europe shared 2nd floor twins beds sink shared bathrooms super clean view balcony canals breakfast simple job cereals croissants coffee tea food expensive venice helped staff friendly saved money paid cash paid 70 euros night instead 90 hopefully soon
